January 121 - Artist, has worked for ETV station and has production
experiencei wants permanent ETV position. Young lady, 24, B.F.A.,
single. Location open. $ 65/wk.
January 122 - Male, 29, married, M.A. and working on Ph.D., has
been teaching radio-TV at university level last 3 years, been familiar
with radio since 1939:, with TV since 1951. Wants teaching position
or combination,teaching and program planning. Location open. $5000.
January 123, - Program director, continuity writer and women's comÂ¬
mentator for commercial radio station wants similar position in
educational radio. Woman, single, 39, M.A. Location, salary open.
January 124.Male,35, married, Ph.D., 6 years college teaching
including ^radio-TV courses, 4 years high school teaching and comri
mercial radio experience, desires position in educational broadcasting
in programming or administration. Prefers locate in northern Midwest.
$5000.
January 125 - Producer-writer, announcer, director of more than
1000 educational broadcasting programs seeks affiliation with
educational.station in similar capacity. Also interested in public
service programs. Male, 39, single. Location open. $400/month.
January 126 - Artist, a director of animated color cartoons for UPA,
paintings have been exhibited nationally, 2 years teacher of art at
large university, also talented in writing, music, color and layout
for TV. Desires position as ETV art director. Location open. Male,
31, married, M.A. $7000.
January 127 - Young man, 26, single, B.S. in Journalism with minor
in broadcasting, desires educational broadcasting position. Location
open. $3 2 5/month.
January 128 - TV producer for armed forces whose past experience
includes being film editor for network TV station, wants position in
ETV where there are opportunities for graduate work. Male, 32,
married, B.S. Location open. $5000.
